WRITING.TEXT: Jesus Christ, OP... I am very new to this but damn... Keep us updated with what happens dude... I never even knew about the zodiac killer but your story pulled me into it... And i have only one little doubt about your story... The fake photo... That makes the story look made up as if you wanted your story to seem more credible and you went on google images took that image and pretended it was sent to you... Anyway... You may be onto something...

I prayed to the the closest god i can find and he replied in a deep and a little bit of a sexual tone "The answer to your problem is to delete system32... Should i trust him? Is that a good solution?

WRITING.TITLE: I have a virus.
WRITING.TEXT: Guys... I have a pretty bad virus... It shows a blue screen and white text on it and my computer stops... What should i do?
